felicette_img_loading.lead_text: A headless image loading component that uses the Intersection Observer API
felicette_img_loading.title: Felicette img-loading

felicette_img_loading_utils.lead_text: A suite of CLI and NodeJS utilities for img-loading including generating placeholders and optimizing images
felicette_img_loading_utils.title: Felicette img-loading-utils

felicette_recipes.lead_text: Save your recipes, the ingredients needed to make them and create shopping lists to organize your day to day
felicette_recipes.title: Felicette Recipes

footer.about: Felicette is an open-source project by {link}. Made with love and cats from Curitiba, Brazil

tsuru_no_mundo.lead_text: Landing page for the Tsuru No Mundo project including a beautiful slider de photographies
tsuru_no_mundo.title: Tsuru No Mundo

tsuru_no_mundo_daily.lead_text: The daily project from the Tsuru No Mundo project. A static page made with eleventy with a huge grid of images with lazy loading (using felicette-img-loading)
tsuru_no_mundo_daily.title: Tsuru No Mundo Daily

open_source.title: This site is open source
open_source.description: You can see the source code and do whatever you want with it.

share.title: Share
share.description: If you liked this project, share it with your friends. You can download this GIF and use in your site linking to https://felicette.dev or https://felicette.app
